Example of a good analysis in:

Stan: https://mc-stan.org/users/documentation/case-studies/pool-binary-trials.html

RStanArm: https://mc-stan.org/users/documentation/case-studies/pool-binary-trials-rstanarm.html

In generabl: https://mc-stan.org/users/documentation/case-studies.html

Steps to be demonstrated:

-   State the research question clearly
-   Describe the model in stat notation including priors
-   Show prior predictive simulation
-   Describe key attributes of raw data
-   Show a few plots of raw data
-   Fit the model
-   Comment on model diagnostics, did the model converge?
-   Perform posterior predictive checks
-   Comment on predictive strengths an weeknesses
-   Show at least one model improvement
-   Peform model comparison and comment if model had improved
-   Short discussion of results, limittations, and possible further direction
